message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're starting high, I'll meet you in the middle!
You're not meeting me in the middle, I'm meeting you in the low!
You're trying to lowball me, but I'll give you a chance to sweeten the deal!
Let's find a middle ground, Bob! I'll meet you halfway.
You're getting desperate, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're not getting away with this, Bob! I'm taking control!
You're getting aggressive, but I'm not backing down!
Let's be realistic, Bob. We're getting close to the end.
You're trying to squeeze the last drops, but I'm not going to let you have it all!
This is my last offer, Bob. Take it or leave it.
